name: RabiesTestsForRabiesVirusAntibodyInCSF
title: Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Antibody in CSF)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rabies virus antibody in CSF.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Rabies virus Ab CSF;  

LOINC search:  'rabies CSF Ab -isolate'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
